Key Match Events: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play with one another in NBA history.
The Suns outscored the Lakers by four points during LeBron and Bronny's shared time on the floor in the first half.
Pre-Game Insights: Coach JJ Redick planned on playing LeBron and Bronny within the flow of a game and not in a 'gimmicky' manner.
Redick said pregame that he was very honored that he got to be part of history.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron said he was still trying to get used to the feeling of playing with his son.
Bronny said he prepared as if it were a normal game, but it's impossible to compartmentalize the situation and view his dad simply as a teammate.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers celebrated him with a cake and cupcakes earlier in the day at the team hotel.
Others: The Lakers drafted Bronny with the 55th pick in the 2024 NBA Draft.
Bronny entered the NBA after just one year at USC, where he averaged 4.8 points and 19.3 minutes in 25 games.
